resources.string: Data sourced from Samsung Health. Samsung Health is a trademark of Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.
Samsung Health® is a registered trademark of Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. This app is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.
Data sourced from Google Health Connect. Health Connect is a trademark of Google LLC.
Google Health Connect™ is a trademark of Google LLC. This app is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by Google LLC.
Connect your Garmin device to access advanced health metrics including HRV, recovery scores, stress levels, and biological age calculations.
Connect Samsung Health to access ECG data, body composition measurements, and comprehensive health metrics from Samsung devices.
Connect Health Connect to access health data from multiple apps and devices in a unified, secure platform.
Your health data is encrypted and stored securely. You maintain full control over data sharing and can revoke access at any time.
All health data displays include proper attribution to ensure transparency about data sources.
Advanced fitness and recovery metrics from Garmin devices
Comprehensive health data from Samsung Health platform
Unified health data from multiple apps and devices

This app is for informational purposes only and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice. Health metrics from connected devices may vary in accuracy. Always consult with qualified healthcare providers regarding health concerns.
Health data accuracy may vary depending on device calibration, usage conditions, and individual factors. Use this information as a general guide for wellness tracking.

This app integrates with third-party health platforms to provide comprehensive health insights. Data usage is governed by both this app\'s privacy policy and the respective platform\'s terms of service.
Comprehensive health and wellness tracking with multi-platform integration
This app integrates with Garmin Connect to access health and fitness data from Garmin devices. Garmin device required for full functionality.
This app integrates with Samsung Health to access health data from Samsung devices. Samsung Health app required for full functionality.
This app integrates with Health Connect to access unified health data from multiple sources. Health Connect required for full functionality.

Manage your connections to health platforms and data synchronization preferences
How often to sync health data from connected platforms
All health platform data displays include proper attribution as required by platform guidelines
This app complies with all health platform brand guidelines and developer program requirements
For Garmin-specific issues, visit the Garmin Connect support page or contact Garmin support directly
For Samsung Health issues, visit Samsung Health support or contact Samsung support
For Health Connect issues, visit Google Health Connect support or check your device settings
Connect your favorite health platforms to get comprehensive insights and personalized recommendations
All health platform connections are optional. You can use the app with manual data entry only.
All connections use secure authentication and encryption to protect your health data
Critical compliance issues found - must be resolved before app store submission
These badges demonstrate proper brand compliance for all integrated health platforms
